About Malebo Tech Ltd

Malebo Tech Ltd is a premier electrical engineering company founded by Eugine Ingaso, a qualified electrical engineer specializing in power systems. With years of experience in the industry, we are committed to delivering top-quality electrical solutions to our clients.

Our team of certified professionals combines technical expertise with a customer-focused approach to ensure every project meets the highest standards of safety and efficiency.
